info.name: Pretty Purple Playmoss Theme
info.description:
A cute purple and pink simple playmoss theme with dashed borders, larger icons, centered text, increased contrast between text and background, round icons, and all that jazz.

The entire style is commented, so feel free to make your own edits to your taste. Completely customizable!
info.additionalInfo:
This took way longer than it should have for how clean their code is... playmoss why is every button with the exact same parameters individually coded.

Also I didn't mean to use the bi pride flag colors, it just happened naturally.
